title: Block Ciphers
introtext: Block ciphers and their modes are a core part of cryptography. Different modes have different strengths and weaknesses.
avalanchesub1: Changing one bit in the plaintext changes about 50% of the ciphertext bits with the same key.
avalanchesub2: Changing one bit in the key changes about 50% of the ciphertext bits with the same plaintext.
modes: Learn about the different cipher modes of block ciphers and their behavior.
